definition: structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: He is a national important contribution expert and is granted a Special Allowance from the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 國家級有突出貢獻專家，國務院特殊津貼獲得者。

sentences.english: Enlisted recipients of the Medal of Honor are entitled to a supplemental uniform allowance.
sentences.chinese: 榮譽勳章獲得者將有資格獲得軍人的津貼。

sentences.english: We have a great admiration for the gold medalists.
sentences.chinese: 我們對金牌獲得者極爲敬佩。

sentences.english: Are there any Nobel Prize winners at Princeton?
sentences.chinese: 普林斯頓大學有沒有培養出諾貝爾獎獲得者呢？

sentences.english: The Nobel Prize winner contributed much to the research in this field.
sentences.chinese: 這位諾貝爾獲得者爲這一領域的研究做出了很大貢獻。

sentences.english: This means accepting it as presented by its favored class, by those who profited most from it .
sentences.chinese: 這意味着它是按最高利益獲得者的視角描繪下來的。

sentences.english: In the Olympics of voting, there are no gold medalists.
sentences.chinese: 在選舉的奧林匹克競賽中，沒有金牌獲得者。

sentences.english: She is a graduate of the Air Force Academy and a Rhodes scholar.
sentences.chinese: 她畢業於美國空軍學院並是一名羅茲獎學金獲得者。

sentences.english: All medallists are requested to undergo a "dope" test after the final.
sentences.chinese: 決賽後，要對所有獎牌獲得者作興奮劑檢查。

sentences.english: And warmly welcome( ) to give awards to our winners.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎三等獎獲得者上臺。

sentences.english: Sun Honglei is awarded with the "Best Performance Art" and the "Most Popular Actor".
sentences.chinese: 最佳表演藝術獎最具人氣演員獎獲得者孫紅雷。

sentences.english: This one belonged to Nobel Prize-winning author Ernest Hemingway.
sentences.chinese: 這一項發明屬於諾貝爾獲得者，作家海明威。

sentences.english: The Oscar-winning scribe was charged with vehicular manslaughter.
sentences.chinese: 這位奧斯卡最佳編劇獎獲得者被控過失殺人。

sentences.english: And now Obama is the Nobel Peace Prize winner.
sentences.chinese: 現在，奧巴馬是諾貝爾和平獎獲得者了。
這位七次世界冠軍獲得者退役。

sentences.english: We should be proud of our Nobel Prize winners.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該爲我們的諾貝爾獎獲得者感到自豪。
